price: 78. Hubaalna Rabbigaa (Alle) wuxuu ugu kala garsoori dhexdooda xukunkiisa, waana Adkaadaha, wax kasta Ogsoon.
arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقۡضِي بَيۡنَهُم بِحُكۡمِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna rabbaka yaqḍī baynahum biḥuk'mihi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ʿalīmu
